Name: Please State Your Name : A VR Animated Film
About the game: Experience an animated film, told completely in Virtual Reality. Set in a cartoon sci-fi world. A small robot head that can only speak the words, 'Please State your Name', desperately tries to escape a dangerous garbage facility.
